text:
When we were at 800K views, I asked you nicely to not retweet this @Morning_Joe montage of @realDonaldTrump lying about #COVID19, so as not to anger the snowflake president.

Now we are at 1.6 million views and he's accusing @MSNBC hosts of murder. 

https://t.co/VnWqrsqxrj
